  • angle (float) – Treshold angle in degrees

getlists()¶
intersect(center, radius, cell)¶

Checks if the circle around the relevant point is intersecting with the cell bouderies

Parameters

  • angle (float) – Treshold angle in degrees

  • cell (cell) – Cell object
